nodes.text: The Monumenters were a group of criminals on the planet Corellia at the time of the Galactic Civil War. They were mostly bandits and smugglers.
After the Battle of Yavin, the Monumenters were in open conflict with the Corellian Security Force and Beldonna's League.

Circa 1 ABY, the Monumenters attempted to create a criminal partnership with the Chirq Council to deal spice on Corellia. They organized a meeting near Doaba Guerfel but a CorSec agent infiltrated in the Chirq Council managed to join the meeting. The CorSec agent attacked and killed the participants, and then stole a cargo of spice. The spacer later returned to the Chirq Council underboss Jzoro Quanera and blamed the Monumenters for killing his men and stealing the spice.

The Monumenters are one of many small criminal groups in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. They can be found in the wilderness of the planet Corellia where the game's NPC spawning system occasionally creates small groups of Monumenter bandits, marauders and smugglers. By killing them, the player gains faction standing with CorSec and Beldonna's League.
